faqs.question: What are your operating hours?
faqs.answer: BroFit is open Monday through Friday from 5:00 AM to 11:00 PM, Saturday from 6:00 AM to 10:00 PM, and Sunday from 7:00 AM to 9:00 PM. Holiday hours may vary.

faqs.question: How do I cancel or change my membership?
faqs.answer: You can cancel or modify your membership by visiting your Dashboard and clicking on 'Manage Membership'. Cancellations require 30 days notice. You can also visit our front desk for assistance.

faqs.question: Can I bring a guest?
faqs.answer: Yes! Depending on your membership plan, you receive guest passes each month. Starter members get 2 passes, Popular members get 5 passes, and Premium members enjoy unlimited guest passes.

faqs.question: Do I need to book classes in advance?
faqs.answer: We recommend booking classes at least 24 hours in advance to secure your spot, especially for popular classes. You can book through your Dashboard or our mobile app.

faqs.question: What if I need to cancel a booked class?
faqs.answer: You can cancel a booked class up to 2 hours before the start time without penalty. Late cancellations or no-shows may result in temporary booking restrictions.

faqs.question: Is personal training included in membership?
faqs.answer: A complimentary fitness assessment is included with all memberships. Popular members receive 1 free personal training session, while Premium members receive 4 sessions. Additional sessions can be purchased separately.

faqs.question: Do you offer student or senior discounts?
faqs.answer: Yes! We offer a 15% discount for students with valid ID and a 20% discount for seniors (65+). Please present your ID at the front desk when signing up.

faqs.question: What should I bring to my first visit?
faqs.answer: Bring comfortable workout clothes, athletic shoes, a water bottle, and a towel. We provide lockers, showers, and basic toiletries. Don't forget your membership card or app!

faqs.question: Is there parking available?
faqs.answer: Yes, we have a large parking lot with free parking for all members. Premium members also get access to reserved spots near the entrance.

faqs.question: Do you have a mobile app?
faqs.answer: Yes! The BroFit app is available for iOS and Android. You can book classes, track workouts, view your membership details, and connect with trainers all from your phone.
